mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (title, body, memberId) VALUES (#{title}, #{body}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.title, b.body, b.inserted, COUNT(r.id) numOfReply, m.id memberId, m.nickName writerNickName, f.fileName FROM Board b LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.board_id JOIN Member m ON b.memberId = m.id LEFT JOIN File f ON b.id = f.boardId WHERE b.id = #{id}
